character.age: 25 years old, but appears younger due to elven heritage
character.role: Main Protagonist, Seeker of Lost Knowledge
character.background: Born and raised in the mystical realm of Elvanar, Eira was trained by her parents, both renowned scholars, in the ancient art of magic. She has spent years studying and mastering various spells, but a mysterious force drew her away from her home to explore the wider world.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown with hints of Gold
